name: 露娜传
description:
important: after the game is running, you need to wait about 1 minute for reading. Please wait patiently for a moment to appear the game window.

This game is a traditional type of RPG with DQ style, which is very rich in content. It will take you back to the good memories of playing RPG!

The game took nearly three years to make. Welcome to visit RPG friends who like DQ and nostalgia.


Quick browsing of content:

video 0:00-2:30 (plot introduction)

Video 2:30-6:40 (game system, features and mechanism)

Video 6:40 end (battle screen)


Features of the game:

0. The game is divided into six chapters, plus extra chapters, a total of seven chapters. Each chapter is an independent story, with several story lines implied, and the setting is similar to dq4.

1:. Every chapter will enter the achievement hall, and the NPC in it will tell you the game hiding in the previous chapter and give you corresponding rewards according to your exploration.

2. Whether it's map construction, character setting, weapons, magic, etc., the main style is made by imitating DQ series.

3. With a rich plot, the game will be very interesting in exploring, solving puzzles and discovering hidden elements.

4. The game has a broad world view and a very long game process. This long is not reflected in boring brush monster level training or brush equipment, but a clever combination of real plot and battle.

5. Dozens of copies and playing methods are hidden in the game. These hidden copies have nothing to do with the main line, but if you can explore and complete them, you can get some powerful equipment or props

6. Please see the promotional video of the game for specific introduction.


ps: if you have any problems or suggestions in the game, welcome to join the group or contact me (qq:29065683), and you will be sure to repair and improve them in future updates!
